data.comment: The match has started at Municipal de Balaidos.
Celta Vigo are pushing forward but Denis Suarez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for Valencia at Municipal de Balaidos.
Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Valencia to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
Celta Vigo are coming forward and Nolito gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 7, Emre Mor for Celta Vigo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a Valencia throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
In the minute 9, Valencia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in the half of Valencia.
Valencia are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 12, Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Iago Aspas.
That's a fine assist from Nolito.
In the minute 17, Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Celta Vigo.
Valencia's Geoffrey Kondogbia misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vigo.
In the minute 22, Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Celta Vigo just outside Valencia's area.
Nolito (Celta Vigo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Valencia at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Valencia in their own half.
In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Celta Vigo's Renato Tapia has been booked in Vigo.
In the minute 26, Jesus Gil Manzano awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 28, Jesus Gil Manzano awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Throw-in Valencia.
In the minute 30, Fran Beltran of Celta Vigo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
In the minute 34, Free kick Valencia.
Celta Vigo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Valencia.
Valencia's Daniel Wass misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 36, Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
Free kick Valencia.
In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 39, Celta Vigo's Emre Mor breaks free at Municipal de Balaidos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Valencia at Municipal de Balaidos.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in the half of Valencia.
In the minute 41, Lucas Olaza of Celta Vigo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Valencia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Valencia.
In the minute 44, Jesus Gil Manzano signals a Valencia throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
Valencia have a goal kick.
Jesus Gil Manzano will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Valencia in the half of Celta Vigo.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Valencia to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
Jason is replacing Kang In Lee for Valencia at Municipal de Balaidos.
The away team replace Goncalo Guedes with Manu Vallejo.
Goal! Maxi Gomez equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Great play from Daniel Wass to set up the goal.
In the minute 49, Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Valencia.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 51, Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
Celta Vigo's Emre Mor gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
In the minute 53, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Valencia at Municipal de Balaidos.
Can Celta Vigo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 55, Vicente Esquerdo (Valencia) has received a yellow card from Jesus Gil Manzano.
Celta Vigo take a 2-1 lead thanks to Iago Aspas.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Celta Vigo.
In the minute 59, Celta Vigo's Nolito is on target but unsuccessful.
Jesus Gil Manzano blows against Celta Vigo's Nolito for offside.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Valencia in the half of Celta Vigo.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in the half of Valencia.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Valencia.
Gabriel Paulista (Valencia) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Corner awarded to Valencia.
In the minute 65, Valencia have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
Valencia have a dangerous throw-in.
Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Oscar Garcia (Celta Vigo) is making a first substitution, with Okay Yokuslu replacing Fran Beltran.
Miguel Baeza is replacing Denis Suarez for the home team.
Can Valencia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
In the minute 68, Valencia to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
Free kick Celta Vigo.
Celta Vigo's Renato Tapia is whistled for offside at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 70, Ball safe as Valencia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
Celta Vigo make their second substitution with Brais Mendez replacing Emre Mor.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Valencia in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Celta Vigo in Vigo.
In the minute 74, Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
Thierry Correia is on a sub for Vicente Esquerdo for Valencia.
Can Celta Vigo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valencia's half?
Nolito (Celta Vigo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
Celta Vigo push forward at Municipal de Balaidos and Miguel Baeza gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Valencia defence.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Renato Tapia.
Celta Vigo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 80, In Vigo Celta Vigo attack through Nolito. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vigo.
In the minute 80, The home team replace Jeison Murillo with Gabriel Veiga.
Nestor Araujo (Celta Vigo) has replaced the possibly injured Renato Tapia.
Valencia's Jason gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Celta Vigo defender.
In the minute 83, Celta Vigo apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Brais Mendez. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Throw-in Celta Vigo.
In the minute 84, Miguel Baeza gets his shot on target but fails to score for Celta Vigo.
Valencia make their fourth substitution with Ruben Sobrino replacing Yunus Musah.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 87, Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Attention is being given to Valencia’s Maxi Gomez and play has been suspended briefly.
Valencia's Maxi Gomez is back in action after a slight knock.
Joseph Aidoo for Celta Vigo is back on the field again.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vigo.
7 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Valencia pushes forward through Maxi Gomez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
Celta Vigo's Iago Aspas gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards Valencia a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Valencia.
Valencia have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
Valencia surge into the attack at Municipal de Balaidos but Jose Luis Gaya’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Full-time! The final score is 2-1.
Joseph Aidoo is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Okay Yokuslu is booked for the home team.
Ivan Villar (Celta Vigo) has received a first yellow card.
